entry.title: Saturday Lightning Talks
entry.summary:
Summary

PyOhio 2013 Saturday Lightning Talks

Description

(00:00) Gears

(0:04:43) Ron DuPlain - Use Werkzeug's web-based interactive debugger with Tornado.

(0:09:54) Chad Whitacre - https://www.gittip.com

(0:14:56) Larry Hastings - Two Clever Uses Of... XOR!

(0:17:52) Joe Shaw - Woven photo service http://woventheapp.com

(0:23:30) Ann Elliott - pySerial on Raspberry Pi

(0:29:38) Christopher Felton - Binary Hello World

(0:33:22) Eric Welch - EqPy

(0:38:51) Brad Montgomery - Julython

entry.title: **More lightning talks!**
entry.summary:
Description

  • (0:00:00) 2015 was great, 2016 needs you. Eric and Brian
  • (0:03:06) Issue trackers for your town. - Chad Whitacre
  • (0:07:48) How much can I share with five minutes? -Ron DuPlain
  • (0:12:55) Computer colors importance. -Scott Sievert
  • (0:17:02) Piecing together a story with Google Maps. Lars
  • (0:22:06) Back to the Cheese Shop. -Cameron
  • (0:22:52) Logging Framework and Postgres -Matthew Wilson
  • (0:25:40) Conda and Virtualenv -Brian Costlow
  • (0:30:30) PyOhio 2017 -Brian Costlow
  • (0:33:15) All good things come to an end -Lars
